name: Prolimatech PK-2 Nano Aluminum High-Grade 1.5 g Thermal Paste
Features: [Excellent long-term stability, Not electrically conductive, Non-corrosive, Easy to apply and less to use, No "burn-in" time required, Low dry-out, Material Specification: Al 70~88(wt%), ZnO 15~27(wt%), Oil 11~19(wt%), Antioxidant 0.5~2(wt%), Adhesiveness: 250000Cps, Thermal Conductivity: 10.2 W/m - Degree C, Thermal Impedance (Resistance): 0.015 Degree C-in2/W, Included: One syringe of thermal compound and one easy-to-spread spoon, Specific Gravity: 2.5g/cm3]
